languages.text:
Также для каждого поста можно получить одну особую способность. Такая способность требует заряда, накапливающегося каждый раунд боя, дополнительно с его окончанием и в некоторых событиях вне боя. Можно зарядить сразу несколько таких способностей на разных постах, но использовать можно только одну особую способность в каждом бою.
На посты корабля лучше назначать офицеров из числа компаньонов. Для каждого поста требуется определенный навык или условие, зато у компаньонов есть специальные умения, усиливающие некоторые корабельные способности.

In addition to basic abilities, each post can have one {g|Encyclopedia:UltimateAbilities}ultimate ability{/g}. Such abilities require time to charge. The gauge gradually fills each round of combat, at the end of combat, and during certain events outside combat. You can have multiple ultimate abilities from different posts charged up at once, but only one of them can be used in a single battle.
It is advisable to assign one of your companions to each post as the officer in charge. A specific skill or some other condition is required for each post, but your companions have special features that can improve some of your ship's abilities.
languages.original_text:
Также для каждого поста можно получить одну особую способность. Такая способность требует заряда, накапливающегося каждый раунд боя, дополнительно с его окончанием и в некоторых событиях вне боя. Можно зарядить сразу несколько таких способностей на разных постах, но использовать можно только одну особую способность в каждом бою.
На посты корабля лучше назначать офицеров из числа компаньонов. Для каждого поста требуется определенный навык или условие, зато у компаньонов есть специальные умения, усиливающие некоторые корабельные способности.

traits.locale_text:
In addition to basic abilities, each post can have one ultimate ability. Such abilities require time to charge. The gauge gradually fills each combat round, at the end of combat, and during certain events outside combat. You can have multiple ultimate abilities from different posts charged up at once, but only one of them can be used in a single battle.
It is advisable to assign one of your companions to each post as the officer in charge. A specific skill or some other condition is required for each post, but your companions have special features that can improve some of your ship's abilities.

It is advisable to assign one of your companions to each post as the officer in charge. A specific skill or some other condition is required for each post, but your companions have special features that can improve some of your ship's abilities.

The gauge gradually fills each round of combat, at the end of combat, and during certain events outside combat. You can have multiple ultimate abilities from different posts charged up at once, but only one of them can be used in a single battle.
It is advisable to assign one of your companions to each post as the officer in charge. A specific skill or some other condition is required for each post, but your companions have special features that can improve some of your ship's abilities.

languages.text:
Zusätzlich zu Basis-Fähigkeiten kann jeder Posten eine {g|Encyclopedia:UltimateAbilities}ultimative Fähigkeit{/g} haben. Solche Fähigkeiten erfordern Zeit zum Aufladen. Die Leiste füllt sich allmählich jede Runde im Kampf, am Ende eines Kampfes sowie während bestimmter Ereignisse außerhalb des Kampfes. Du kannst mehrere ultimative Fähigkeiten von verschiedenen Posten gleichzeitig aufgeladen haben, jedoch nur eine von ihnen kann in einem einzelnen Kampf eingesetzt werden.
Es ist ratsam, jedem Posten einen deiner Gefährten als befehlshabenden Offizier zuzuweisen. Eine bestimmte Fertigkeit oder eine andere Bedingung ist für jeden Posten erforderlich, aber deine Gefährten haben besondere Eigenschaften, die einige der Fähigkeiten deines Schiffs verbessern können.
languages.original_text:
In addition to basic abilities, each post can have one {g|Encyclopedia:UltimateAbilities}ultimate ability{/g}. Such abilities require time to charge. The gauge gradually fills each round of combat, at the end of combat, and during certain events outside combat. You can have multiple ultimate abilities from different posts charged up at once, but only one of them can be used in a single battle.
It is advisable to assign one of your companions to each post as the officer in charge. A specific skill or some other condition is required for each post, but your companions have special features that can improve some of your ship's abilities.

traits.locale_text:
Zusätzlich zu Basis-{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} kann jeder {g|Encyclopedia:PostSpace}Posten{/g} eine ultimative Fähigkeit haben. Solche Fähigkeiten erfordern Zeit zum Aufladen. Die Leiste füllt sich allmählich jede {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} im Kampf, am Ende eines Kampfes sowie während bestimmter Ereignisse außerhalb des Kampfes. Du kannst mehrere {g|Encyclopedia:UltimateAbilities}ultimative Fähigkeiten{/g} von verschiedenen Posten gleichzeitig aufgeladen haben, jedoch nur eine von ihnen kann in einem einzelnen Kampf eingesetzt werden.
Es ist ratsam, jedem Posten einen deiner Gefährten als befehlshabenden Offizier zuzuweisen. Eine bestimmte {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Fertigkeit{/g} oder eine andere Bedingung ist für jeden Posten erforderlich, aber deine Gefährten haben besondere Eigenschaften, die einige der Fähigkeiten deines Schiffs verbessern können.

languages.text:
En plus des capacités de base, chaque poste peut disposer d'une {g|Encyclopedia:UltimateAbilities}capacité ultime{/g}. Ces capacités ont besoin de temps pour se charger. La jauge se remplit progressivement à chaque round de combat, à la fin de l'affrontement et lors de certains événements hors combat. Vous pouvez avoir plusieurs capacités ultimes issues de différents postes et chargées simultanément, mais une seule d'entre elles peut être utilisée au cours d'un même combat.
Il est conseillé d'affecter l'un de vos compagnons à chaque poste en tant qu'officier. Une compétence précise ou une autre condition est requise pour chaque poste, mais vos compagnons disposent de caractéristiques spéciales qui peuvent améliorer certaines des capacités de votre vaisseau.
languages.original_text:
In addition to basic abilities, each post can have one {g|Encyclopedia:UltimateAbilities}ultimate ability{/g}. Such abilities require time to charge. The gauge gradually fills each round of combat, at the end of combat, and during certain events outside combat. You can have multiple ultimate abilities from different posts charged up at once, but only one of them can be used in a single battle.
It is advisable to assign one of your companions to each post as the officer in charge. A specific skill or some other condition is required for each post, but your companions have special features that can improve some of your ship's abilities.

traits.locale_text:
En plus des {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} de base, chaque {g|Encyclopedia:PostSpace}poste{/g} peut disposer d'une capacité ultime. Ces capacités ont besoin de temps pour se charger. La jauge se remplit progressivement à chaque {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} de combat, à la fin du combat et lors de certains événements hors combat. Vous pouvez disposer de plusieurs {g|Encyclopedia:UltimateAbilities}capacités ultimes{/g} issues de différents postes chargées simultanément, mais une seule d'entre elles peut être utilisée au cours d'un même combat.
Il est conseillé d'affecter un de vos compagnons à chaque poste en tant qu'officier. Une {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}compétence{/g} spécifique ou une autre condition est requise pour chaque poste, mais vos compagnons disposent de caractéristiques spéciales qui peuvent améliorer certaines des capacités de votre vaisseau.

languages.text:
除了基本的能力之外，每个职位还有一个{g|Encyclopedia:UltimateAbilities}终极能力{/g}。终极能力需要一定时间才能完全充能。终极能力会在战斗的每轮中、战斗结束时，以及战斗之外的某些事件中进行充能。您可以为多个不同职位装备多个终极能力，但每场战斗中只能使用一个终极能力。
您最好在每个职位上都分配一名同伴，让每个职位都有负责人。不同的职位需要不同的技能与额外条件。委任同伴之后，您的同伴的特性可以提高虚空舰的性能。
languages.original_text:
In addition to basic abilities, each post can have one {g|Encyclopedia:UltimateAbilities}ultimate ability{/g}. Such abilities require time to charge. The gauge gradually fills each round of combat, at the end of combat, and during certain events outside combat. You can have multiple ultimate abilities from different posts charged up at once, but only one of them can be used in a single battle.
It is advisable to assign one of your companions to each post as the officer in charge. A specific skill or some other condition is required for each post, but your companions have special features that can improve some of your ship's abilities.

traits.locale_text:
除了基本的{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}之外，每个{g|Encyclopedia:PostSpace}职位{/g}还有一个终极能力。终极能力需要一定时间才能完全充能。终极能力会在战斗的每{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}中、战斗结束时，以及战斗之外的某些事件中进行充能。您可以为多个不同职位装备多个{g|Encyclopedia:UltimateAbilities}终极能力{/g}，但每场战斗中只能使用一个终极能力。
您最好在每个职位上都分配一名同伴，让每个职位都有负责人。不同的职位需要不同的{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}技能{/g}与额外条件。委任同伴之后，您的同伴的特性可以提高虚空舰的性能。

languages.text:
Además de sus capacidades básicas, cada puesto puede tener una capacidad definitiva. Esta clase de capacidades se recargan con el tiempo. El medidor se va llenando con cada asalto, al final del combate y durante ciertos acontecimientos ajenos al combate. Se pueden tener varias {g|Encyclopedia:UltimateAbilities}capacidades definitivas{/g} recargadas en puestos distintos al mismo tiempo, pero solo se puede emplear una por batalla.
Se recomienda asignar un compañero a cada puesto en calidad de oficial. Todos los puestos requieren una habilidad concreta u otro tipo de condición, pero tus compañeros cuentan con características especiales que pueden potenciar las capacidades de tu nave.
languages.original_text:
In addition to basic abilities, each post can have one {g|Encyclopedia:UltimateAbilities}ultimate ability{/g}. Such abilities require time to charge. The gauge gradually fills each round of combat, at the end of combat, and during certain events outside combat. You can have multiple ultimate abilities from different posts charged up at once, but only one of them can be used in a single battle.
It is advisable to assign one of your companions to each post as the officer in charge. A specific skill or some other condition is required for each post, but your companions have special features that can improve some of your ship's abilities.

traits.locale_text:
Además de sus {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} básicas, cada {g|Encyclopedia:PostSpace}puesto{/g} puede tener una capacidad definitiva. Esta clase de capacidades se recargan con el tiempo. El medidor se va llenando con cada {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}, al final del combate y durante ciertos acontecimientos ajenos al combate. Se pueden tener varias {g|Encyclopedia:UltimateAbilities}capacidades definitivas{/g} recargadas en puestos distintos al mismo tiempo, pero solo se puede emplear una por batalla.
Se recomienda asignar un compañero a cada puesto en calidad de oficial. Todos los puestos requieren una {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}habilidad{/g} concreta u otro tipo de condición, pero tus compañeros cuentan con características especiales que pueden potenciar las capacidades de tu nave.

languages.original_text:
You can also gain one special ability for each post. This ability requires a charge that accumulates each round of combat, additionally at the end of combat and in some events outside of combat. You can charge several of these abilities on different posts at once, but you can only use one special ability per battle.
It is better to assign companion officers to the ship's posts. Each station requires a specific skill or prerequisite, but companions have special skills that enhance some of the ship's abilities.

languages.text:
基礎アビリティに加え、各ポストは{g|Encyclopedia:UltimateAbilities}究極アビリティ{/g}を1つ所持することができる。こうしたアビリティはチャージに時間を要する。ゲージは戦闘の各ラウンド中、戦闘終了時、戦闘時以外の特定のイベントの間に徐々に溜まっていく。異なるポストの複数の究極アビリティが一度にチャージ可能だが、1回の戦闘に使用できるのはそれらのうちの1つのみである。
仲間を各ポストに担当士官として任命しておくことが望ましい。各ポストでは特定のスキルまたはその他の条件が要求されるが、仲間は一部の船のアビリティを強化する特殊な機能を持っている。
languages.original_text:
In addition to basic abilities, each post can have one {g|Encyclopedia:UltimateAbilities}ultimate ability{/g}. Such abilities require time to charge. The gauge gradually fills each round of combat, at the end of combat, and during certain events outside combat. You can have multiple ultimate abilities from different posts charged up at once, but only one of them can be used in a single battle.
It is advisable to assign one of your companions to each post as the officer in charge. A specific skill or some other condition is required for each post, but your companions have special features that can improve some of your ship's abilities.

traits.locale_text:
基礎{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}に加え、各{g|Encyclopedia:PostSpace}ポスト{/g}は究極アビリティを1つ所持することができる。究極アビリティはチャージに時間を要する。ゲージは戦闘の各{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}中、戦闘終了時、戦闘時以外の特定のイベントの間に徐々に溜まっていく。異なるポストの複数の{g|Encyclopedia:UltimateAbilities}究極アビリティ{/g}が一度にチャージ可能だが、1回の戦闘に使用できるのはそれらのうちの1つのみである。
仲間を各ポストに担当士官として任命しておくことが望ましい。各ポストでは{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}特定{/g}のスキルまたはその他の条件が要求されるが、仲間は一部の船のアビリティを強化する特殊な機能を持っている。

languages.text:
Her bir mevki, temel kabiliyetlerin yanı sıra bir de {g|Encyclopedia:UltimateAbilities}üstün kabiliyete{/g} sahip olabilir. Bu kabiliyetlerin dolması zaman alır. Sayaç; her çatışma raundunda, çatışmanın sonunda ve çatışma dışında belirli bazı olaylar sırasında kademeli olarak dolar. Aynı anda farklı mevkilere birden çok üstün kabiliyet yüklemiş olabilirsin ancak bir çatışmada bunlardan yalnızca birini kullanabilirsin.
Her mevkiye onun sorumlu subayı olarak bir yoldaşını ataman önerilir. Her mevki için belirli bir yetenek veya koşul gerekir ancak yoldaşlarının geminin bazı kabiliyetlerini artırabilecek özel maharetleri bulunur.
languages.original_text:

The gauge gradually fills each round of combat, at the end of combat, and during certain events outside combat. It is advisable to assign one of your companions to each post as the officer in charge. A specific skill or some other condition is required for each post, but your companions have special features that can improve some of your ship's abilities.
